20110111161317.000|20110111161319.000|CC1|THAT YOUR RISK FOR THE CANCER   
20110111161319.000|20110111161322.000|CC1|INCREASES EXPONENTIALLY.        
20110111161322.000|20110111161325.000|CC1|HE'LL NEED TO STOP SMOKING AND  
20110111161325.000|20110111161325.000|CC1|DRINKING.                       
20110111161325.000|20110111161327.000|CC1|TRY TO AVOID HPZ.               
20110111161327.000|20110111161329.000|CC1|THAT'S A SEXUALLY TRANSMITTED   
20110111161329.000|20110111161331.000|CC1|DISEASE CALLED HUMAN            
20110111161331.000|20110111161332.000|CC1|PAPILLOMAVIRUS AND MAY BE       
20110111161332.000|20110111161334.000|CC1|INVOLVE FLD A QUARTER OF ALL    
20110111161334.000|20110111161335.000|CC1|THROAT CANCERS.                 
20110111161335.000|20110111161339.000|CC1|ALSO WE HAVE TO NOT JUST FOCUS  
20110111161339.000|20110111161339.000|CC1|ON PREVENTION BUT EARLY         
20110111161339.000|20110111161340.000|CC1|DETECTI
